      Returns:

    • isInternetAvailable

      public static boolean isInternetAvailable()
      Checks if the system has an active internet connection. This method attempts to connect to a reliable URL ([http://www.google.com](http://www.google.com)).
      Returns:
      true if the internet is available, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentTime
